name: CreateSubscription
description:
Creates a subscription for a customer to a subscription plan.

If you provide a card on file in the request, Square charges the card for
the subscription. Otherwise, Square bills an invoice to the customer's email
address. The subscription starts immediately, unless the request includes
the optional `start_date`. Each individual subscription is associated with a particular location.

body.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

$block:
Defines the fields that are included in the response from the
[CreateSubscription](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/subscriptions-api/create-subscription) endpoint.

$ul: **errors**: Information about errors encountered during the request.
**subscription**: Represents a customer subscription to a subscription plan.
**canceled_date**: The subscription cancellation date, in YYYY-MM-DD format (for
**charged_through_date**: The date up to which the customer is invoiced for the
**created_at**: The timestamp when the subscription was created, in RFC 3339 format.
**customer_id**: The ID of the associated [customer](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/Customer) profile.
**id**: The Square-assigned ID of the subscription.
**invoice_ids**: The IDs of the [invoices](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/objects/Invoice) created for the
**location_id**: The ID of the location associated with the subscription.
**price_override_money**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.
**amount**: The amount of money, in the smallest denomination of the currency
**currency**: The type of currency, in __ISO 4217 format__. For example, the currency
**start_date**: The start date of the subscription, in YYYY-MM-DD format (for example,
**status**: The current status of the subscription.
**tax_percentage**: The tax amount applied when billing the subscription. The
**timezone**: Timezone that will be used in date calculations for the subscription.
